meanings.definition: To invent or create something jointly with another person.
meanings.sent1: Tom and Jerry coinvent a new game to play together.
meanings.sent2: The two friends coinvent a secret handshake.
meanings.sent3: The siblings coinvent a silly dance that makes everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The students coinvent a clever way to remember all the math formulas.
meanings.sent5: The scientists coinvent a groundbreaking technology that changes the world.
meanings.sent6: After much brainstorming, they coinvent a solution to the problem.
meanings.sent7: The team coinvents a unique strategy to win the competition.

meanings.definition: The act of inventing something together with another person.
meanings.sent1: Their coinvention led to a revolutionary product in the market.
meanings.sent2: The coinvention of the new recipe was a success.
meanings.sent3: The coinvention of the story made it even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: The coinvention of the game brought joy to many children.
meanings.sent5: The coinvention of the song became an instant hit.
meanings.sent6: The coinvention of the painting showcased their creativity.
meanings.sent7: Their coinvention won them the award for innovation.
